titleStmt.title: SII 13.211: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 211. (A.R. No. 333 of 1928.) NERŪR, KARUR TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, VARADARĀJA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This registers a sale of land to the temple of Śrī Pāṇḍaṉ-Viṇṇagardēvar at Vīraśōḻa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam (by which name evidently Nerūr was known), a brahmadēya in Kīḻaṅga-nāḍu by Bāradāyaṉ (Bhāradvājan) Nārāyaṇaṉ Nārāyaṇaṉ a resident of the village. The price he received is stated to have been 3(1/2) kaḻañju of gold by the standard weight known as Kāśeṭṭāṅkal, which probably signifies that a kaḻañju of gold was equivalent to 8 kāśu in weight. This is incised in late characters and is probably an inscription of Kulōttuṅga-Chōḷa I.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
korājakesaripaṉmaṟkku yāṇṭu 10Āvatu kiḻaṅkanāṭṭu brahmadeyam viracoḻaccaruppeti maṅkalattu pāratāyaṉ nārāyaṇaṉ nārāyaṇaṉen Ivūr tirumeṟṟaḷiāḻvār śrī pāṇṭaṉ viṇṇakardevarkku viṟṟukkuṭutta
nilamāvatu Ivūrk keraḷamātevivāykkālukku vaṭakku nitimittravatikku meṟkku Āṟāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāntuṇṭattu vaṭakiḻakkaṭaiya kāṇiyaraikkāṇi cey Ivūr sabhaiyār pakkal pāratāyaṉ nārāyaṇaṉ colai vilaikoṇṭu tan makkaḷ colainārāyaṇaṉum co
lai kṛṣṇaṉukkum kūṟāka kuṭukka Avarkaḷpakkal nāṉ vilaikoṇṭu Uṭaiya Ikkāṇi yaraikkaāṇi ceyūm viṟṟu kuṭuttu koṇṭa vilaiporuḷ kāceṭṭāṅkallāl mukkaḻañ carai poṉ Āvaṇakkaḷiye koṇṭu Inilam kāṇi yaraikkāṇi(y)c ceyum vilaik kuṟa vi
ṟṟukkuṭutteṉ śrī pāṇṭaṉ viṇṇakartevarkku .
Digital edition of SII 13.211 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
